column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////The food at Bavette's is absolutely phenomenal. Per another Yelper's suggestion
column2: we ordered the Peppered Duck & Goat Cheese Terrine hors d'oeuvre. It is amazing
column4: and served with house-baked sourdough bread that is to die for. Ask for extra bread and BUTTER. Their butter is also made in-house. It is salted and creamy and oh so good. All of our main dishes were delectable
column5: but also amazing are their side dishes. We tried the creamed spinach. What is in this dish that makes it SO GOOD?! (Actually
column6: don't tell me. It's probably something very high cal that I don't want to consider when enjoying this dish again!) And the buttery mashed potatoes? Also great.
